amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to transfer funds from the EPA Environmental Programs and Management account to the Forest Service for active management.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
